The StudyLang enhances language learning by allowing users to translate, listen to, and save selected text on any website to a personal dictionary. This functionality also applies to subtitles on YouTube and Netflix. If a saved word or phrase reappears, it will be automatically highlighted, displaying a tooltip for easy reference. In the extension settings, users can manage their saved words, refine custom articles, and access statistics on word and phrase frequency.

Additionally, StudyLang includes an Optical Character Recognition (OCR) feature that allows users to translate text from images. This means users can capture text from photos, screenshots, or scanned documents and translate it directly within the extension. This added capability makes it easier to learn from a variety of sources, including printed materials and online images, further enhancing the language learning experience.
